name: The Disastrous Adventure of: WESLEY SQUID
name_original: The Disastrous Adventure of: WESLEY SQUID
description:
This is the disastrous adventure of WESLEY SQUID - a squid stuck in a minecart

Wesley is a simple squid but somehow, he has found himself trapped in a minecart deep in a dungeon. Will he escape? Will we ever find out how he ended up in the cart? Probably not, but it’s worth a shot!

The aim of the game is to guide WESLEY SQUID through the dungeon to try and find the exit. The controls are difficult on purpose because he’s a squid but don’t let that discourage you! Every dungeon is 100% possible to complete

CONTROLS:

  • A & Left Arrow = ROTATE left 
  • D & Right Arrow = ROTATE Right
  • W & Up Arrow = MOVE Forward 
  • S & Down Arrow = MOVE Backwards 
  • Enter = RESPAWN in the last checkpoint

THANK YOU FOR CHECKING OUT THE GAME!

Details about the project:

  • This is a submission for the Miz Jam 1 game jam
  • The assets used were made by Kenney which was required by the rules of the Jam
  • The entire game was made in under 48 hours
